arts.ttl: ‘I'm going’: Theo Walcott gives his score prediction for Chelsea vs Liverpool on Saturday
arts.sum: Following consecutive defeats, Arne Slot’s Liverpool side will now face Chelsea at Stamford Bridge in the Premier League. Liverpool are still top of the table...

arts.ttl: Liverpool very serious about signing 23-year-old Chelsea target with 16-G/A this season
arts.sum: Liverpool are interested in signing the Bayern Munich attacker Michael Olise at the end of the season. The French International has been outstanding since the move to Germany. The 23-year-old has already picked up eight goals and eight assists in 14 appearances across all competitions this season. He has been outstanding in the Bundesliga and […] The post Liverpool very serious about signing 23-year-old Chelsea target with 16-G/A this season appeared first on CaughtOffside.

arts.ttl: Liverpool star 'ruled out' of Chelsea clash; Reds could receive Ekitike boost
arts.sum: Liverpool are reportedly hopeful that Hugo Ekitike will be able to feature against Chelsea in the Premier League clash on Saturday, but Alisson Becker has been ruled out.

arts.ttl: Arne Slot's worst fear confirmed with Alisson Becker set to miss SIX weeks of action - including clashes with Chelsea, Man City and Real Madrid - in hammer blow to Liverpool's already creaky defence
arts.sum: LEWIS STEELE: Liverpool are set to be without star goalkeeper Alisson for around six weeks after the Brazil No 1 went down with a hamstring blow in Istanbul on Tuesday night.
